Hero.title: Road Safety, Redefined.
Hero.subtitle: A step-by-step road safety platform built for India, packed with tips & rules.

Truth.title: Are the accidents really that much?

WhyRoadha.heading: Why Roadha?
paragraphs: Indians keep on buying more & more cars. But have their brains gotten bigger with the road safety knowledge too?
According to MoRTH, 153,972 persons were killed in road crashes in the year 2021.
Are these increasing year by year?

abilities.heading: Learn the Rules
abilities.paragraph: Master the basics of Indian traffic laws through structured, simple lessons.

abilities.heading: Quiz Your Knowledge
abilities.paragraph: Interactive quizzes help reinforce safety tips and real-life scenarios.

abilities.heading: Drive with Confidence
abilities.paragraph: Build habits that protect you, your family, and others on the road.

features.heading: Ask Roadha
features.paragraph: Ask Roadha about any road safety tips and laws.

features.heading: Ultimate Road Safety Guide
features.paragraph: FREE Step-by-step course covering road safety rules, tips & scenarios in India.

features.heading: Seatbelt & Helmet Awareness
features.paragraph: Learn why skipping helmets or seatbelts, even for short trips, can be fatal. Includes real examples and laws.

questions.question: What is Roadha?
questions.answer: Roadha is a platform to learn Indian road safety rules through short lessons, tips, and quizzes.

questions.question: Who is it for?
questions.answer: Anyone who drives, rides, or wants to understand road rules better.
